page.title: 11Commerce in N.E.Mynd Area
page.content: One local farm has extended its interests to include a large boarding kennels and cattery,whilst another has two holiday cottages to let.There are three small caravan sites on various farms and one beautiful 15th Century farmhouse offers Bed & Breakfast accommodation. A scrapyard and a comprehensive builders' supplies store offer some employment,a welcome change in an area that has seen the closure of the rail- way station and the decline of the local brickmaking industry.Coalmining, now a thing of the past here,not only provided much needed jobs but also fuel for the villagers. The village of Woolstaston is home to a talented potter.A lovely old barn is now her workshop and the finished products are sold through an interior designer in London.
